words.definition: Money in the form of coins or bills.
words.arabic_definition: المال بشكل عملات أو أوراق نقدية.

words.definition: A plastic card used to buy things on credit.

example.en: Can I pay with a credit card?

words.definition: To give money in exchange for something.

example.en: I need to pay for the groceries.

words.definition: To get something by paying money.

example.en: He wants to buy a new phone.
You can choose the color you like.

words.definition: To make a choice or judgment.

example.en: I can't decide which one to buy.
example.ar: لا أستطيع أن أقرر أيهما أشتري.

words.definition: A paper showing you have paid for something.
words.arabic_definition: ورقة تُظهر أنك دفعت ثمن شيء ما.

words.definition: Money returned when you pay more than the cost.
words.arabic_definition: المال المعاد بعد دفع مبلغ أكبر من السعر.
